snippet.title: Simple Java Program Example For Beginners
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast
- In this video, I show you how to make a simple, rolling dice program in java! If you're looking for a java program example, you've come to the right place!

👑Get 10 free java programs to start practicing instantly - http://alexlorenlee.com/
🌅 Source code: https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Programs/RollingDice.java

I like to take a break from learning and just making programs! That's why I made this simple java program for beginners, that I hope will help you learn-by-doing!

I hope you enjoyed this simple java program for beginners on creating your own rolling dice program! I really enjoy making videos like this so I'll probably do a lot more project tutorials like this one :)

Do you want to learn how to code from scratch, in Python? Check out my video on How to Code in Python: https://youtu.be/woJb2hAfkO0

On this channel I make new java tutorials every week for beginners and also easy java projects for beginners, so if that's something your into, consider subscribing!

What challenges did you face when making your rolling dice program? -

7 Tips on How To Think Like a Programmer: https://manychat.com/l2/102224234605534
New Programmer Support: https://www.facebook.com/groups/616837729085352
Java Students Unite: https://www.facebook.com/groups/2414953521949898/

10% off merch: https://teespring.com/i-have-no-idea-what-do-2020?pr=sysout10
